string-array.item: 850 Crore Chips for Power User (Teen Patti-Indian Poker)
240 Crore Chips for Power User (Teen Patti-Indian Poker)
85 Crore Chips for Elite Player (Teen Patti-Indian Poker)
23 Crore Chips for Elite Player (Teen Patti-Indian Poker)
9 Crore Chips for Power User (Teen Patti-Indian Poker)
4 Crore Chips for Power User (Teen Patti-Indian Poker)
25 Lakh Chips for Power User (Teen Patti-Indian Poker)

resources.string: One deck used per round. 6 cards are dealt to each player on the table.
• Select table level and click on "JOIN NOW" to enter the tournament.
• 3 empty sets displayed on the bottom left side.
• 6 cards displayed on bottom right side.
• Place the best possible cards in the sets of 3 cards, 2 cards, 1 card respectively.
◦ Assume one card in set of 2; assume two cards in set of 1.
• Cards can be placed using any of the following methods.
◦ One card at a time: Drag any one card to a particular set.
◦ Multiple cards together: Click and select multiple cards then click on the set where you want to drop the cards.
• After placing all the 6 cards in 3 sets, place "GO" button.
• Then there will be a consecutive showdown on the table for all the 3 sets.
• Winning of a set will be decided based on Teenpatti ranking of hands.
• Player will get 60 points on winning a hand. So, in a single round 3 hands will be played.
• Maximum 180 points can be scored in one round.
• There will be total 5 rounds in the tournament with max score 900 for a single player.
• In case of tie, points will be divided equally amongst the players.
• Click on "PLAY AGAIN" to enter the same level tournament.
